## CommandTranslationMetadata

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/i18n/src/types.ts" sourceLine="10" packageName="@commandkit/i18n" />

Represents the metadata for command translations.

```ts title="Signature"
interface CommandTranslationMetadata {
    name?: string;
    description?: string;
    options?: (
    | Record<'name' | 'description', string>
    | Record<string, Record<'name' | 'description', string>>
  )[];
}
```

### name

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`string`}   />

The name of the command.
### description

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`string`}   />

The description of the command.
### options

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`(     | Record&#60;'name' | 'description', string&#62;     | Record&#60;string, Record&#60;'name' | 'description', string&#62;&#62;   )[]`}   />

The options for the command.
